Package com.marginallyclever.communications.serial

Class SerialConnection

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.communications.serial.SerialConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkConnection, jssc.SerialPortEventListener
public final class SerialConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements jssc.SerialPortEventListener, NetworkConnection
Created on 4/12/15. Encapsulate all serial receive/transmit implementation and adds checksum calculations
Since:
v7
Author:
Peter Colapietro

    • errorReported

      protected int errorReported​(java.lang.String line)
      Check if the robot reports an error and if so what line number.
      Returns:
      -1 if there was no error, otherwise the line number containing the error.
